scripts.build: cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && mkdir -p dist && cp ../../target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/qnighy_swc_plugin_dedent.wasm dist/index.wasm
scripts.build:debug: cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && mkdir -p dist && cp ../../target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/debug/qnighy_swc_plugin_dedent.wasm dist/index.wasm
